body_html:
1. The issue should be fixed currently; zero_debias is no longer the default in ExponentialMovingAverage.
  2. There is a strong possibility that is will be the default in the future.
  3. ExponentialMovingAverage create variables, so for future safety you might consider using it as if it respected variable scopes (ie don't put it in resuse=True variable scopes that it doesn't need to be in)
body_text:
The issue should be fixed currently; zero_debias is no longer the default in ExponentialMovingAverage.
There is a strong possibility that is will be the default in the future.
ExponentialMovingAverage create variables, so for future safety you might consider using it as if it respected variable scopes (ie don't put it in resuse=True variable scopes that it doesn't need to be in)
body:
1. The issue should be fixed currently; zero_debias is no longer the default in ExponentialMovingAverage.
2. There is a strong possibility that is will be the default in the future.
3. ExponentialMovingAverage create variables, so for future safety you might consider using it as if it respected variable scopes (ie don't put it in resuse=True variable scopes that it doesn't need to be in)
